decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and Access Statement received: 30 May 2017. 180-LM-01 received: 31 May 2017. TP9, TP10, TP11, TP12, TP14, and TP17 received: 6 July 2017. TP13 received: 7 July 2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The development hereby permitted shall not be commenced until detailed design and method statements (in consultation with London Underground), have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority which: provide details of dormer enlargement ; provide details on the use of tall plant and scaffolding; demonstrate access to elevations of the building adjacent to London Underground can be undertaken without recourse to entering London Underground land; and demonstrate that there will at no time be any potential security risk to our railway, property or structures
description: Enlargement of an existing roof extension incorporating two front roof windows
